data.text:
2018-19 Men's Basketball Roster

Choose a Player:

3 Jason Richardson

Position Guard

Class Junior

Height 6-2

Weight 205

Hometown Gardena, Calif.

Highschool Junipero Serra High School

Prev School Cal State Northridge / Fullerton College

Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

2018-19 | Junior Season

Appeared in 10 contests and made eight starts for SUU

Scored an SUU career-high 22 points against Central Michigan (12/8/18)

Finished the season with 56 total points, 26 assists, 14 rebounds and nine steals

Season was cut short due to an injury

2017-18 | Fullerton College

Averaged 18.6 ppg and 5.0 apg in 28 contests for the Hornets

Scored a season-high 32 points against Citrus

2015-17 | Cal State Northridge

Received a Redshirt for the 2016-17 Season

As a freshman in 2015-16 he appeared in 30 games and started in 12, averaging 6.5 ppg and 2.4 apg

Scored a career-high 22 points against South Dakota and dished out seven assists on two different occasions

Prep:

Four-year letterman and a team captain for two seasons

Helped lead his team to a CIF IVAA Championship

Named to the Daily Breeze All-Area Team

McDonalds All-American Nominee

Del Rey Conference First Team All-League

Honors student all four years, including being named Eugene Profit Scholar Athlete for having the highest GPA on his team

Averaged 18.3 ppg, 5.6 rpg, 4.7 apg and 2.1 spg in high school
